page.title: 05Catholic Church Cockermouth
page.content: We are Roman Catholics and we go to {St Joseph's Roman Catholic Church}in Cockermouth. Our Church is quite a big one. It can fit about 3 or 4 hundred in it. At the back of the Church there is a choir stall. It is next to the organ. At the side of the church there is a coffee room and thats where people sometimes go and have some coffee after mass. On the side of the walls in the Church there are paint- ings of Jesus and how he was crucified on the cross. By the stained glass windows there are statues of Mary and Joseph. The place where you get bapti- sed is covered with iron bars with patterns on.Our Vicar is{Father {Mc'Gough}and he lives next door to the Church. Three masses are held on Sunday, one is at 8.30am, another is at 10.30am and the last is at 7.30pm at night.
